name: George Orwell
bio: English novelist and essayist, journalist and critic. His work is characterised by lucid prose, social criticism, opposition to totalitarianism, and support of democratic socialism.

name: Agatha Christie
bio: English writer known for her sixty-six detective novels and fourteen short story collections, particularly those revolving around fictional detectives Hercule Poirot and Miss Marple.

name: Stephen King
bio: American author of horror, supernatural fiction, suspense, crime, science-fiction, and fantasy novels. His books have sold more than 350 million copies worldwide.

name: Jane Austen
bio: English novelist known primarily for her six major novels, which interpret, critique and comment upon the British landed gentry at the end of the 18th century.

name: J.K. Rowling
bio: British author best known for the Harry Potter fantasy series...
